meaning: A mask symbolizes the social face and roles we present to the world.
A mirror represents the reflection of hidden parts of the self.
Water symbolizes the flow of the unconscious and emotions.
A ladder represents ascent, transition, striving upward.
A forest symbolizes the unknown, the unconscious, the wild.
A child represents innocence, potential, and the core Self.
A bird symbolizes guidance between realms and messages from the unconscious.
An elder figure represents wisdom and guidance.
A mother symbolizes nurturing, protection, and the source of life.
A fox represents cunning, disruption, and playful subversion.
